library(RefManageR)

BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, 
           bib.style = "authoryear", 
           cite.style = 'authoryear',
           first.inits = TRUE,
           style = "markdown",
           hyperlink = FALSE, 
           dashed = FALSE)
myBib <- ReadBib("r-references.bib", check = FALSE)

here::here('R/demo.R') %>%
  read_chunk(.)
